response:
I'm more than happy to help you with that! Since we don't have a direct password reset functionality within this chat, let me guide you through the process to recover your account.

1. Go to our website and click on the "Sign In" button.
2. Click on "Forgot Password?" below the login fields.
3. Enter the email address associated with your account and click "Send Request."
4. You should receive an email from us shortly with a password reset link. Please note that this link expires after 24 hours for security reasons.
5. Click on the link and follow the instructions to create a new password for your account.

If you don't receive an email within a few minutes, please check your spam folder or make sure you've entered the correct email address. If you still have trouble accessing your account after trying these steps, feel free to ask me again!

Once you've successfully reset your password, you can return to this chat and continue our conversation seamlessly. Have a great day!
